Add lower granularity when applicable

Source: R/cast.R
cast_code.Rd

This function will add lower granularity to the current granularity when applicable. It means that when casting a kommune file, then columns for fylke will be added. For grunnkrets file then both kommune and fylke code will be added. This is based on the available table that can be downloaded from SSB. The file should be in a CSV format.

cast_code(file, type, year, folder.path = NULL, keep.col = c("code", "name"))

Arguments

file

File names
type

Type of regional granularity ie. fylke, kommune etc.
year

Year of the selected code list
folder.path

Folder path to the files
keep.col

Exisiting column names to be kept

Examples

if (FALSE) {
file <- "c:/Users/geo/ssb_grunnkrets_jan2020.csv"
type <- "grunnkrets"
year <- 2020
cols <- c("code", "name")

DT <- cast_code(file = file, type = type, year = year, keep.col = cols)
}
